ModMetaData.name: WallHeater
ModMetaData.author: Slabby
ModMetaData.description:
Adds wall mountable heater to the game. Roughly comparable to the vanilla heater, but wall mountable.
Power can be customized in Mod settings.
Based of ArcJc's great mod WallStuff (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1994340640)
PRs accepted!
